item.title:
New creation myth dropped, care of my 5 year old daughter.
The planet is a giant's garbage bag, and the sun is where he burns the trash.
Given the state of things, it makes a lot of sense.

item.title: @ylecun AI systems are not people, they are human-made tools. Tools more capable than humans have been produced since the beginning of history. Tools themselves are nothing to be afraid of but humans also have a long history of using those tools to do things others fear.
